summary: Frontend testing complete for SoulNutri - Sistema de identificação de pratos. All 8 test cases passed successfully.

1_ui_layout_camera_top.details: Camera container is at the top with good visible area (min-height: 280px)

2_nova_foto_button_visible.details: Nova Foto button is visible alongside Galeria button, disabled when no result

3_galeria_button_file_selector.details: Galeria button triggers hidden file input for image selection

4_auto_capture_toggle.details: Auto-capture checkbox toggles correctly and shows countdown (3s)

5_dish_identification.details: Image upload via Galeria returns dish data correctly (tested with aboboraaocurry.jpeg)

6_result_display.details: Result shows: dish name (Abóbora ao Curry), confidence (100%), category (vegano), ingredients, benefits, risks (Alérgeno: coco), nutrition info

7_footer_powered_by.details: Footer shows 'Powered by Emergent' discretely at bottom

8_nova_foto_clears_result.details: Nova Foto button clears the displayed result and becomes disabled again

critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Good use of useRef for loading state to prevent re-renders in auto-capture
Proper error handling with separate error states for API and network errors
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 8 frontend test cases passed. Camera is not available in test environment (expected), but file upload via Galeria works perfectly. The app correctly identifies dishes and displays all nutritional information. Mobile responsive design works well.
